channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-41942|2024-09-26T19:52:30.978Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20aws%20codecommit%20trigger%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins AWS CodeCommit Trigger Plugin 3.0.12 and earlier allows attackers to clear the SQS queue.

item.title: CVE-2023-41930|2024-09-26T19:59:09.503Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20job%20configuration%20history%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Job Configuration History Plugin 1227.v7a_79fc4dc01f and earlier does not restrict the 'name' query parameter when rendering a history entry, allowing attackers to have Jenkins render a manipulated configuration history that was not created by the plugin.

item.title: CVE-2023-41946|2024-09-26T19:47:18.189Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20frugal%20testing%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Frugal Testing Plugin 1.1 and earlier allows attackers to connect to Frugal Testing using attacker-specified credentials, and to retrieve test IDs and names from Frugal Testing, if a valid credential corresponds to the attacker-specified username.

item.title: CVE-2023-41931|2024-09-26T19:58:39.502Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20job%20configuration%20history%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Job Configuration History Plugin 1227.v7a_79fc4dc01f and earlier does not property sanitize or escape the timestamp value from history entries when rendering a history entry on the history view, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-41935|2024-09-26T19:55:15.254Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20azure%20ad%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Azure AD Plugin 396.v86ce29279947 and earlier, except 378.380.v545b_1154b_3fb_, uses a non-constant time comparison function when checking whether the provided and expected CSRF protection nonce are equal, potentially allowing attackers to use statistical methods to obtain a valid nonce.

item.title: CVE-2023-41947|2024-09-26T19:20:50.520Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20frugal%20testing%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Frugal Testing Plugin 1.1 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to Frugal Testing using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2023-41937|2024-09-26T19:53:52.607Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20push%20and%20pull%20request%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Bitbucket Push and Pull Request Plugin 2.4.0 through 2.8.3 (both inclusive) trusts values provided in the webhook payload, including certain URLs, and uses configured Bitbucket credentials to connect to those URLs, allowing attackers to capture Bitbucket credentials stored in Jenkins by sending a crafted webhook payload.

item.title: CVE-2023-41938|2024-09-26T19:53:22.647Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20ivy%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Ivy Plugin 2.5 and earlier allows attackers to delete disabled modules.

item.title: CVE-2023-41936|2024-09-26T19:54:41.046Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20google%20login%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Google Login Plugin 1.7 and earlier uses a non-constant time comparison function when checking whether the provided and expected token are equal, potentially allowing attackers to use statistical methods to obtain a valid token.

item.title: CVE-2023-41943|2024-09-26T19:51:59.246Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20aws%20codecommit%20trigger%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins AWS CodeCommit Trigger Plugin 3.0.12 and earlier does not perform a permission check in an HTTP endpoint, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission to clear the SQS queue.

item.title: CVE-2023-41941|2024-09-26T19:52:56.969Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20aws%20codecommit%20trigger%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins AWS CodeCommit Trigger Plugin 3.0.12 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to enumerate credentials IDs of AWS credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2023-41932|2024-09-26T19:58:14.787Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20job%20configuration%20history%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Job Configuration History Plugin 1227.v7a_79fc4dc01f and earlier does not restrict 'timestamp' query parameters in multiple endpoints, allowing attackers with to delete attacker-specified directories on the Jenkins controller file system as long as they contain a file called 'history.xml'.

item.title: CVE-2023-41933|2024-09-26T19:57:44.018Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20job%20configuration%20history%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Job Configuration History Plugin 1227.v7a_79fc4dc01f and earlier does not configure its XML parser to prevent XML external entity (XXE) attacks.

item.title: CVE-2023-41934|2024-09-26T19:57:19.685Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%20maven%20integration%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline Maven Integration Plugin 1330.v18e473854496 and earlier does not properly mask (i.e., replace with asterisks) usernames of credentials specified in custom Maven settings in Pipeline build logs if "Treat username as secret" is checked.

item.title: CVE-2024-43045|2024-08-07T17:45:05.211Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.470 and earlier, LTS 2.452.3 and earlier does not perform a permission check in an HTTP endpoint, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission to access other users' "My Views".

item.title: CVE-2024-43044|2024-08-07T17:29:40.580Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.470 and earlier, LTS 2.452.3 and earlier allows agent processes to read arbitrary files from the Jenkins controller file system by using the `ClassLoaderProxy#fetchJar` method in the Remoting library.

item.title: CVE-2024-39460|2024-08-02T04:26:15.217Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20branch%20source%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Bitbucket Branch Source Plugin 886.v44cf5e4ecec5 and earlier prints the Bitbucket OAuth access token as part of the Bitbucket URL in the build log in some cases.

item.title: CVE-2024-39459|2024-08-02T04:26:14.969Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20plain%20credentials%20plugin
item.description: In rare cases Jenkins Plain Credentials Plugin 182.v468b_97b_9dcb_8 and earlier stores secret file credentials unencrypted (only Base64 encoded) on the Jenkins controller file system, where they can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system (global credentials) or with Item/Extended Read permission (folder-scoped credentials).

item.title: CVE-2024-39458|2024-08-02T04:26:14.270Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20structs%20plugin
item.description: When Jenkins Structs Plugin 337.v1b_04ea_4df7c8 and earlier fails to configure a build step, it logs a warning message containing diagnostic information that may contain secrets passed as step parameters, potentially resulting in accidental exposure of secrets through the default system log.

item.title: CVE-2024-39458|2024-07-05T17:22:42.883Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20structs%20plugin
item.description: When Jenkins Structs Plugin 337.v1b_04ea_4df7c8 and earlier fails to configure a build step, it logs a warning message containing diagnostic information that may contain secrets passed as step parameters, potentially resulting in accidental exposure of secrets through the default system log.

item.title: CVE-2024-39459|2024-06-26T18:32:51.005Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20plain%20credentials%20plugin
item.description: In rare cases Jenkins Plain Credentials Plugin 182.v468b_97b_9dcb_8 and earlier stores secret file credentials unencrypted (only Base64 encoded) on the Jenkins controller file system, where they can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system (global credentials) or with Item/Extended Read permission (folder-scoped credentials).

item.title: CVE-2024-5273|2024-05-24T13:46:09.897Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20report%20info%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Report Info Plugin 1.2 and earlier does not perform path validation of the workspace directory while serving report files, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to retrieve Surefire failures, PMD violations, Findbugs bugs, and Checkstyle errors on the controller file system by editing the workspace path.

item.title: CVE-2024-34144|2024-06-06T18:23:11.386Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability involving crafted constructor bodies in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1335.vf07d9ce377a_e and earlier allows attackers with permission to define and run sandboxed scripts, including Pipelines, to bypass the sandbox protection and execute arbitrary code in the context of the Jenkins controller JVM.

item.title: CVE-2024-34148|2024-06-04T17:42:07.420Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20subversion%20partial%20release%20manager%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Subversion Partial Release Manager Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier programmatically disables the fix for CVE-2016-3721 whenever a build is triggered from a release tag, by setting the Java system property 'hudson.model.ParametersAction.keepUndefinedParameters'.

item.title: CVE-2024-34145|2024-06-06T18:23:32.356Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability involving sandbox-defined classes that shadow specific non-sandbox-defined classes in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1335.vf07d9ce377a_e and earlier allows attackers with permission to define and run sandboxed scripts, including Pipelines, to bypass the sandbox protection and execute arbitrary code in the context of the Jenkins controller JVM.

item.title: CVE-2024-34146|2024-06-04T17:41:47.091Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20git%20server%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Git server Plugin 114.v068a_c7cc2574 and earlier does not perform a permission check for read access to a Git repository over SSH, allowing attackers with a previously configured SSH public key but lacking Overall/Read permission to access these repositories.

item.title: CVE-2024-34147|2024-06-04T17:41:24.679Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20telegram%20bot%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Telegram Bot Plugin 1.4.0 and earlier stores the Telegram Bot token unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins controller where it can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2024-39458|2024-06-26T17:06:26.399Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20structs%20plugin
item.description: When Jenkins Structs Plugin 337.v1b_04ea_4df7c8 and earlier fails to configure a build step, it logs a warning message containing diagnostic information that may contain secrets passed as step parameters, potentially resulting in accidental exposure of secrets through the default system log.

item.title: CVE-2024-39460|2024-06-26T17:06:27.695Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20branch%20source%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Bitbucket Branch Source Plugin 886.v44cf5e4ecec5 and earlier prints the Bitbucket OAuth access token as part of the Bitbucket URL in the build log in some cases.

item.title: CVE-2024-39459|2024-06-26T17:06:27.043Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20plain%20credentials%20plugin
item.description: In rare cases Jenkins Plain Credentials Plugin 182.v468b_97b_9dcb_8 and earlier stores secret file credentials unencrypted (only Base64 encoded) on the Jenkins controller file system, where they can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system (global credentials) or with Item/Extended Read permission (folder-scoped credentials).

item.title: CVE-2024-39460|2024-06-26T19:00:20.037Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20branch%20source%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Bitbucket Branch Source Plugin 886.v44cf5e4ecec5 and earlier prints the Bitbucket OAuth access token as part of the Bitbucket URL in the build log in some cases.

item.title: CVE-2024-39458|2024-07-05T20:18:50.446Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20structs%20plugin
item.description: When Jenkins Structs Plugin 337.v1b_04ea_4df7c8 and earlier fails to configure a build step, it logs a warning message containing diagnostic information that may contain secrets passed as step parameters, potentially resulting in accidental exposure of secrets through the default system log.

item.title: CVE-2024-5273|2024-08-01T21:11:12.451Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20report%20info%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Report Info Plugin 1.2 and earlier does not perform path validation of the workspace directory while serving report files, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to retrieve Surefire failures, PMD violations, Findbugs bugs, and Checkstyle errors on the controller file system by editing the workspace path.

item.title: CVE-2024-34144|2024-08-02T02:42:59.914Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability involving crafted constructor bodies in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1335.vf07d9ce377a_e and earlier allows attackers with permission to define and run sandboxed scripts, including Pipelines, to bypass the sandbox protection and execute arbitrary code in the context of the Jenkins controller JVM.

item.title: CVE-2024-34145|2024-08-02T02:43:00.455Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability involving sandbox-defined classes that shadow specific non-sandbox-defined classes in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1335.vf07d9ce377a_e and earlier allows attackers with permission to define and run sandboxed scripts, including Pipelines, to bypass the sandbox protection and execute arbitrary code in the context of the Jenkins controller JVM.

item.title: CVE-2024-34148|2024-08-02T02:51:09.888Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20subversion%20partial%20release%20manager%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Subversion Partial Release Manager Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier programmatically disables the fix for CVE-2016-3721 whenever a build is triggered from a release tag, by setting the Java system property 'hudson.model.ParametersAction.keepUndefinedParameters'.

item.title: CVE-2024-34146|2024-08-02T02:42:59.969Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20git%20server%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Git server Plugin 114.v068a_c7cc2574 and earlier does not perform a permission check for read access to a Git repository over SSH, allowing attackers with a previously configured SSH public key but lacking Overall/Read permission to access these repositories.

item.title: CVE-2024-34147|2024-08-02T02:51:09.825Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20telegram%20bot%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Telegram Bot Plugin 1.4.0 and earlier stores the Telegram Bot token unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins controller where it can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system.

item.description: Jenkins 2.470 and earlier, LTS 2.452.3 and earlier allows agent processes to read arbitrary files from the Jenkins controller file system by using the `ClassLoaderProxy#fetchJar` method in the Remoting library.

item.description: Jenkins 2.470 and earlier, LTS 2.452.3 and earlier does not perform a permission check in an HTTP endpoint, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission to access other users' "My Views".
